body_html:
@lebinhe Please could you provide at least the following information:

  • All the software versions (as requested in the TensorFlow issues template)
  • The exact command lines you are running
  • The configuration of your cluster machines - i.e. are they running firewalls etc

Also, could you please expand on your comment:

All the workers are seemed to be connected to each other. It makes me confused.

From the log messages, it seems that the workers are unable to talk to each other:

tcp_client_posix.c:173] failed to connect to 'ipv4:10.51.151.134:30111': socket error: connection refused

body:
@lebinhe Please could you provide at least the following information:
- All the software versions (as requested in the TensorFlow issues template)
- The exact command lines you are running  
- The configuration of your cluster machines -  i.e. are they running firewalls etc

Also, could you please expand on your comment:

> All the workers are seemed to be connected to each other. It makes me confused.

From the log messages, it seems that the workers are unable to talk to each other:

> tcp_client_posix.c:173] failed to connect to 'ipv4:10.51.151.134:30111': socket error: connection refused
